resources.string: Before you can use &product_name;, you must install &target_browser; X or above.

1. Open &target_browser;.
2. Tap More and select Settings.
3. Tap Advanced.
4. Tap Block content.
5. Activate the Block content functionality.
6. Select &product_name; for &target_browser;.
